text: Nabiko haka mominamathi svayam uniharuko aphno (pranaharu) bhanda badhi cha ra nabika patniharu uniharuki (mominaharuki) ama hun! Ra allahako vidhana anusara, saman'ya momin ra mohajiraharuko apeksa (nabika) natedaraharu apasama ekaâ€“arkasita dherai hakadara chan. Yo arkai kura ho ki timila'i aphna sathiharusamga ramro vyavahara garnuko anumati prapta cha. Yo adesa allahako kitabama lekhi'eko cha
